about_the_game:
Immersive virtual reality experience - VR inspired by the values ​​and social history of the Caral Civilization, the oldest in America, from the "Ceremonial Hall of the Pututus" located on top of the Main Public Building, upper part of "Peñico, City of Social Integration", during the Early Formative 1 (1800-1500 BC). Peñico is one of the 25 urban centers identified in the Supe Valley, 30 years ago, by the team of professionals led by the Peruvian archaeologist Dr. Ruth Shady, principal researcher of Caral.
The team of specialists from the Caral Archaeological Zone makes available this immersive virtual reality experience - VR in which all cybernauts will be able to approach the main values ​​of the Caral Civilization.
detailed_description:
Immersive virtual reality experience - VR inspired by the values ​​and social history of the Caral Civilization, the oldest in America, from the "Ceremonial Hall of the Pututus" located on top of the Main Public Building, upper part of "Peñico, City of Social Integration", during the Early Formative 1 (1800-1500 BC). Peñico is one of the 25 urban centers identified in the Supe Valley, 30 years ago, by the team of professionals led by the Peruvian archaeologist Dr. Ruth Shady, principal researcher of Caral.
The team of specialists from the Caral Archaeological Zone makes available this immersive virtual reality experience - VR in which all cybernauts will be able to approach the main values ​​of the Caral Civilization.
name: Civilización Caral Perú, la más antigua de América

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 o AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 o AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: VR experience of the "Ceremonial Hall of the Pututus" in Peñico, one of the 25 urban centers of the Caral Civilization, the oldest in America. Discovered by Dr. Ruth Shady's team, it offers a virtual immersion in this ancient culture.
